data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 1, Igor Panin awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 4, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Volgograd Arena.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 5, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Igor Panin signals a Volgograd throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 8, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula are pushing forward but Alesandr Lomovitskiy's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 9, Igor Panin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 13, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Kings Kangwa (Arsenal Tula) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Danil Stepanov (Volgograd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Arsenal Tula's Sergey Tkachyov has been booked in Volgograd.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 23, Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal Tula in Volgograd.
In the minute 25, Volgograd will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula's Abdul Mohammed gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Abdul Mohammed (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 26, Arsenal Tula drive upfield and Abdul Mohammed gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 28, Arsenal Tula drive forward but Kings Kangwa is judged offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 30, In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ilya Zhigulev of Volgograd gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 31, Igor Panin awards the home team a throw-in.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Important block from the Arsenal Tula defence as Flamarion fires in a strike for Volgograd.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
Arsenal Tula's Anri Hagush gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
Igor Panin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy breaks free at Volgograd Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Volgograd have a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Free kick in a good position for Arsenal Tula!
In the minute 37, Oleg Kozhemyakin (Volgograd) has received a yellow card from Igor Panin.
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 40, Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
Anri Hagush (Arsenal Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
The first half has been concluded at Volgograd Arena.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Arsenal Tula pushes forward through Georgi Kostadinov, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Volgograd.
Alesandr Lomovitskiy for Arsenal Tula is whistled offside.
Igor Panin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Volgograd's half.
In the minute 51, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 52, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Volgograd Arena.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Volgograd push forward at Volgograd Arena and Sergey Makarov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 58, Free kick Volgograd.
At Volgograd Arena, Nikolay Rasskazov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Volgograd's area.
In the minute 60, Igor Panin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
Arsenal Tula push forward at Volgograd Arena and Kirill Panchenko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Volgograd defence.
In the minute 62, Igor Panin awards the away team a throw-in.
Volgograd make their first substitution with Sergey Serchenkov replacing Nikolai Kipiani.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In Volgograd Volgograd attack through Oleg Kozhemyakin. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
The home team have replaced Kamil Mullin with Andres Ponce. This is the second substitution made today by Aleksandr Khatskevich.
In the minute 70, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Arsenal Tula's Sergey Tkachyov is on target but unsuccessful.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 72, Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Georgi Kostadinov (Arsenal Tula) gets booked by Igor Panin, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 74, Cedric Gogoua of Volgograd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Volgograd are coming forward and Andres Ponce gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Igor Panin awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Dmitri Parfenov is making the team's first substitution at Volgograd Arena with Evans Kangwa replacing Sergey Tkachyov.
In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 78, Arsenal Tula's Kirill Panchenko gets in a shot on goal at Volgograd Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Volgograd.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Important block from the Arsenal Tula defence as Sergey Serchenkov fires in a strike for Volgograd.
An attacking Volgograd player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
In the minute 81, Goal! Flamarion gives Volgograd a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Abdul Mohammed (Arsenal Tula) gets a yellow card.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Nikolay Rasskazov with Yevgeni Lutsenko.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 86, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Daniil Khlusevich is replacing Alesandr Lomovitskiy for the away team.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Volgograd.
Igor Gorbatenko (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Volgograd's area.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 89, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Abdul Mohammed (Arsenal Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Igor Panin will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Igor Panin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Arsenal Tula.
That's full-time at Volgograd Arena. The final score is 1-0.
Anri Hagush for Arsenal Tula has been booked by Igor Panin and receives a first yellow card.
